name: Rebound (itch) (tjbearse)
description:
Shoot to knock the ball into the opposing goal and use the recoil to move about the court. Play with keyboard or controller, even share a controller with friend!

Features simple controls offered in a multitude of ways:

  • Turn: analog stick, D-pad, a and d keys, left and right arrows, or k and semi-colon keys
  • Shoot: triggers, bumpers; w, s, o, k, or shift keys; or up or down arrows
  • Split a controller for two players by holding select
  • Split a keyboard for up to 3 players by holding "o"
